document.full_text: idaho's governor said on thursday he signed into law a measure banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, making idaho the third state to enact such a late term abortion prohibition.
document.title: idaho governor signs abortion ban past 20 weeks
lines_and_colors: idaho's governor said on thursday he signed into law a measure banning abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy, making idaho the third state to enact such a late term abortion prohibition.
